Program Description: $100 Rebate for Electric Storage Water Heater with a .93+ Uniform Energy Factor (UEF)
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Electric Storage Water Heater with a .93+ Uniform Energy Factor. Instantaneous (Tankless) units do not qualify
Other Restrictions: complete within 60 days of installation or mail/drop off the information to your local SSVEC office

Program Description: $500 rebate for all electric package heat pump with a 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 minimum rating
Equipment Standards Restrictions: must have a 14.3 SEER2/6.7 HSPF2 minimum rating

Technology (If selected 'Other'): All electric split system heat pump
Program Description: $500 rebate for all electric split system heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating
Equipment Standards Restrictions: must have a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating

Program Description: $500 rebate for all electric ductless heat pump with a minimum 2 tons and must have 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating
$200 rebate for an electric heat pump with a 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum rating paired with a gas furnace with minimum 81% efficiency
Equipment Standards Restrictions: electric heat pump with 15.2 SEER2/7.5 HSPF2 minimum paired with a gas furnace with minimum 81% efficiency
